snippet: The holiday represents a rare day off when friends and family can gather in New York for a large wedding reception.
abstract: Many newly married Chinese-Americans hold wedding receptions on Thanksgiving Day--holiday that represents rare day off and allows families to come together.
lead_paragraph: The holiday represents a rare day off when friends and family can gather in New York for a large wedding reception.

headline.main: For Some Chinese-Americans, Thanksgiving Is for Wedding Receptions
headline.print_headline: Chinatown on Thanksgiving Pulses With Revelry
